column4: does ubuntu come with MySQL, and ffmpeg or Berkeley MPEG encoder (mpeg_encode)?
my linux box is not connected to the net either, will that cause a problem?
uargh. alright
packages.ubuntu.com should have what I need though?
manually istalling
yeah
manual install, since i don't have ubuntu connected to the net
manually installing packages is not for the faint of heart
well, I have manually installed my webcam package and gcc-3.4 ...
you're obviously on the 'net now, so why don't you connect your ubuntu box?
I had troubles getting my onboard network card to connect with ubuntu
and I don't have a router, so switching the line back and forth is a pain
what mobo?
can't remember off the top of my head, but it is the one that comes with a ShuttleX system
I think it is an issue with my realtek network adapter actually
oh, it's realtek? that shouldn't be any trouble
just look for '8139too' in lsmod
yeah, I have done all that
was it there?
I am sure it is something simple, I just haven't had the chance to look at it because of school. but I am done now so...
yeah, it is there
recently had trouble with a realtek onboard nic. flashing the bios fixed it
hmm. good call. I might just do that
